verses.roman:
caturdaśe--divyonmāda-ārambha varṇana
'śarīra' ethā prabhura, 'mana' gelā vṛndāvana

synonyms: caturdaśe—in the Fourteenth Chapter; divya-unmāda-ārambha—the beginning of the spiritual trance of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; varṇana—describing; śarīra—the body; ethā—here; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mana—the mind; gelā—went; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana.
translation: The Fourteenth Chapter describes the beginning of the Lord's spiritual trance, in which His body was at Jagannātha Purī but His mind was in Vṛndāvana.
